metadataTitle: Blotz - AI Task Manager for ADHD
metadataDescription: AI-powered task manager for ADHD. Generate tasks instantly, break down complex goals, and stay organized effortlessly.
subtitleLine1: Use AI to tackle your daily tasks.
subtitleLine2: Quick task generation • AI breakdown • Easy capture
heroFeature1: Voice input — speak your tasks, AI organizes them
heroFeature2: AI breakdown — split big tasks into small steps
heroFeature3: Gamified rewards — earn stars, stay motivated
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to stay organized and productive
feature1Description: Just speak your thoughts. Blotz uses AI to instantly organize them into clear, actionable tasks—no typing, no stress.
feature2Description: Complete tasks to earn stars and spin the gashapon machine. Unlock rewards and keep your momentum going with fun surprises.
feature3Description: Feeling overwhelmed? Let AI split large tasks into smaller, manageable steps so you can start without the stress.
feedbackTitle: We Want to Hear from You
feedbackSubtitle: Help us improve Blotz by sharing your ideas and feedback. Your input shapes the future of AI-powered task management.
socialSubtitle: Join our community on social media to get the latest updates, tips, and share your experience with Blotz.
socialXhsDesc: Follow us on RedNote for more ADHD productivity tips and community stories!
socialLinkedinDesc: Connect with us on LinkedIn for company news, professional insights, and career opportunities.
